title: krSNA mukundA
sahitya:
krSNA mukundA murArE jaya krSNA mukundA murArE


caraNam 1   karuNA sAgara kamalAnAyaka kanakAmbaradhAri gOpAlA
  caraNam 2    kALiya mardana kamsa niSUdana kamalAyada nayanA gOpAlA
			(toghaiyarA)
kuTila kuntaLam kuvalayadaLa nIlam madhura muraLIrava lOlam
kOTi madana lAvaNyam gOpi puNyam bhajAmi gOpAlam
  caraNam 3    gOpijana mana mOhana vyApaka kuvalayadaLa nIlA gOpAlA
